titles.title: Red River Designation Act of 1993
A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate certain segments of the Red River in Kentucky as components of the national wild and scenic rivers system, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S890-891)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 1/28/1993--Introduced. Red River Designation Act of 1993 - Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate specified segments of the Red River in Kentucky as components of the national wild and scenic rivers system. Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to acquire public and private lands from willing sellers within the boundaries of such designated segments. Authorizes appropriations.
